title: Got penalty for losing my internet connection.
body:
So yeah, Lose my internet then get a 5 games penalty, 50 minutes waiting total. Not my fault. Then, I play with a friend, click accept after 10 minutes waiting and then he's afk not accepting and I still have to wait 10 minutes more and it's not even counting as 1 game. so it's an additional 10 mins.

Should create a system that check for our internet connection and see if it's our fault for leaving the game or not cuz this time it was not my fault and I feel frustrated since it was a ranked game too.

replies.body:
The client doesn't have any way of knowing what caused you to leave, since a disconnect is just a disconnect. If you're out of the game long enough to marked AFK, the reason doesn't matter, only that you were gone long enough for it to have an outcome on the game. If this system wasn't in place, a *large* portion of games would be incomplete due to players leaving all the time for various reasons.

We did recently come out with a way for you to check your general connection health before entering a game and compare that value to players around you. Check out our new [**Lag Report Tool**](https://lagreport.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/) to see how your connection stands up to others around you!
IT's also rather bugged atm. leaver buster needs to be gone because leaver busted
